paper_abstract: We show how the study of the geometry of the nine flex tangents to a cubic produces pseudo-parameterizations, including the ones given by Icart, Kammerer, Lercier, Renault and Farashahi, and infinitely many new ones. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The geometry of flex tangents to a cubic curve and its parameterizations
